altTitles.ja: ゴールデン・ガイ

description.en: Gai Sakurai is the head of the Osaragi clan of the Kikaku family, a gangster organization based in Yokohama. While he is leading a small but highly individualistic clan, an incident breaks out. A young member of the Kikaku family is murdered. Behind the murder is the Akane clan, a rival clan within the Kikaku family. And then there is the existence of the "Tokugawa's buried treasure" in the abyss…… A terrifying tale of intersecting desires, violence, and fate is about to begin…!
description.zh-hk: 极道×德川埋藏金——暴力悬疑剧，巨匠渡边润大型连载堂堂开幕！ ​​​​

title.en: Love Advice from the Great Duke of Hell

altTitles.fa: مشاوره‌های عشقی از اربابِ بزرگِ دوزخ

description.en: The girl of your dreams barely knows you exist. Your friends can’t help. Your family is clueless. So where do you turn for love advice? Who can provide you with that essential assistance for the lovelorn? If you’re average everyday teenager Paul, you summon a powerful demon from deep in the recesses of Hell and frankly, hope for the best.
description.fa: دختر رویاهات روحشم خبر نداره که تو وجود داری. هیچ کمکی هم از دست دوستات بر نمیاد. خونواده‌ت هم از این قضیه خبر ندارن. خب حالا برای مشاوره گرفتن به کی رو می‌زنی؟ کی می‌تونه تورو که یه عاشق دل‌خسته‌ای، اساسی کمک کنه تا برای همه‌چیز آماده باشی؟ اگه یه نوجوون معمولی مثل پال باشی، یه شیطان گولاخ از اعماق دخمه‌های جهنم احضار می‌کنی و جدی جدی امیدواری که همه‌چی درست پیش بره!
description.fr: Un étrange étudiant invoque un puissant démon. Que peut-il bien vouloir ?
description.it:
La ragazza dei tuoi sogni a stento sa che esisti, gli amici non ti possono aiutare, la famiglia non ne sa nulla. Ma allora, dove cercare consigli d'amore? Chi può provvedere a darti quell'assistenza essenziale per il tuo cuore? Se sei il ragazzo della porta accanto, Paul, allora ti basta evocare un potente demone dai più profondi abissi dell'Inferno e, francamente, sperare per il meglio.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/unfins)  
- [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/unfins)

description.en: Park Yun-yeong has a mysterious power which allows her to see ghastly creatures that seem to inhabit our world but not interact with it - unless they notice you acknowledge their existence. That’s when they stop being harmless.
description.pt-br: Park Yun-yeong tem um poder misterioso que permite que ela veja criaturas horríveis que parecem habitar nosso mundo, mas não interagem com ela, a menos que percebam que você reconhece sua existência. É quando eles param de ser inofensivos.

description.en: “Take the prettiest women, ride the fastest war horse, wield the strongest weapon, one rider blocking the GuanDong 18 roads*. One man standing against ten thousand, they bow to this hero of turbulent times. People say if Lu Bu doesn’t die, there will be no opportunity to cause chaos. I laugh at all the hypocrites in the world; there are no other heroes besides Feng Xian. Entering the life story of more than a thousand reincarnations, experiencing the many vicissitudes of life, tempered into steel. Can the current Lu Bu Feng Xian withstand the inevitable end at Bai Men Lou?”

altTitles.ja: 星旅少年：プラネタリウム・ゴースト・トラベル

description.en:
The vast sky is populated with a great many stars on which most of the inhabitants have fallen into a deep sleep, called simply the “Slumbering Stars”. This is the story of a traveler of the stars, a worker for the Planetarium Ghost Travel Company (aka. PGT) named No. 303, as he spends his time visiting those sleeping stars in an attempt to preserve the memories and culture their peoples have left behind. Would you care to join No. 303 on a journey into the quiet night?

TL;DR - Story? Nah. Atmosphere? Yah.

---
Ranked No. 5 on the 2023 Kono Manga wa Sugoi! for the female readers category.

- Fun Fact: The creator, Sakatsuki Sakana, is a huge fan of Yokohama Kaidashi Kikou! So much so that she even did an [interview](https://natalie.mu/comic/pp/hoshitabi) with the YKK mangaka Hitoshi Ashinano recently.

Ha Pung Gae, the elderly Taoist monk who has lived since the end of the Joseon Dynasty, achieves an unexpected breakthrough in the counter-retrogression movement. Despite this success, he is left with only approximately ten years in his remaining lifespan. To evade death, he must now embark on a journey to attain immortality!
description.fr: Ha Pung Gae, un vieux moine taoïste qui vit depuis la fin de la dynastie Joseon, réalise une percée inattendue dans le mouvement de lutte contre la régression. Malgré ce succès, il ne lui reste qu'une dizaine d'années à vivre. Pour échapper à la mort, il doit maintenant entreprendre un voyage pour atteindre l'immortalité !

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム ヴァルプルギスEVE

altTitles.ja-ro: kidō senshi gan damu varupurugisu EVE

description.en:
Haman Khan's sister stands up for her country!
In January 0089 of the Universal Century, Neo Zeon is defeated by AEUG in the final battle. Defeated by the ZZ Gundam, Haman Karn is killed in battle, and the remaining Neo Zeon warriors decide to fight in mourning. In order to counter the one-sided attack, Serana Khan, Haman Khan's sister, makes a sortie with the NT exclusive MS prototype Demartell. The secret story of the birth of the fake Haman Karn from "Mobile Suit Gundam Valpurgis" and the story of the birth of Over.On, which has never been told before, will be depicted!
description.ja:
ハマーン・カーンの妹、祖国のために立ち上がる――！

宇宙世紀００８９年１月、ネオ・ジオンはエゥーゴに最終決戦で敗北する。ZZガンダムに敗北したハマーン・カーンは戦死し、残されたネオ・ジオンの戦士たちは弔い合戦の決意をする。一方的な攻撃に対抗するためハマーン・カーンの妹、セラーナ・カーンはNT専用MSプロトタイプ・ディマーテルで出撃するのであった。今まで語られることのなかった「機動戦士ガンダム ヴァルプルギス」の偽ハマーン・カーン誕生秘話とオーヴェロン誕生の物語が描かれる――！

description.en: Zhi Banyi has a secret. His heart only beats faster when he listens to a streamer called "Dust Under the Light" speak... So, Zhi Banyi decided to go see a psychiatrist. He never could have imagined that his psychiatrist would be the "female" streamer that made his heart beat every night!

altTitles.ja: スライム聖女

description.en: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!

title.en: The God of Destruction Who Gets Cuter and Lewder the More She Goes Viral

altTitles.ja: バズった分だけ可愛くてえっちになる 破壊神

altTitles.ja-ro: Bazuttabun Dake Kawaikute Ecchi ni Naru Hakai-shin

altTitles.es-la: Mientras mas interacciones tenga, mas lindo y travieso se volverá el dios de la destrucción

altTitles.en: Captain Tsubasa: Road to 2002 - Go for 2006

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼　ROAD　TO　2002

description.en:
After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman Revenge

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件: クレイマン Revenge

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Clayman's Revenge

altTitles.ru: О моём перерождении в слизь: Месть Клеймана

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسد فيه كسلايم: انتقام كلايمان

altTitles.tr: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman'in İntikamı

altTitles.uk: Про моє переродження в слиз: Помста Клеймана

description.en:
Walpurgis ended with echoes of a public condemnation. It seems as if a clown's dream has already ran its course. But as if fate was pranking, or the world has other plans, the  supposedly dead Clayman has been resurrected from the dead. Is it the beginning of his dark era once more...?

A new spin-off "Tensura" manga written by the original author Fuse himself!
description.ja: ワルプルギスに響き渡った断末魔。道化の夢は一度は尽きたかと思われた。しかし運命のイタズラか、世界の選択か、死んだはずのクレイマンは復活し、再び暗躍を始め･･･る？
description.es-la:
Este Manga Spinoff es una historia alternativa que sucede luego de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera.

Historia alternativa que continua despues de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera. - El Walpurgis habia terminado con el grito de su muerte. Parecia que el sueño del arlequin habia llegado a su fin. Sin embargo, ya sea por una broma del destino o una decisión del mundo, Clayman quien supuestamente murio, ha resucitado una vez mas. ¿Es el comienzo de una nueva era oscura...?

altTitles.ja: デジモンワールド Re:Digitize Encode
デジモンワールド リ:デジタイズエンコード

title.en: Dantoudai no Hanayome - Sekai wo Horobosu Futsutsuka na Tatsuki desu ga.

altTitles.ja: 断頭台の花嫁 世界を滅ぼすふつつかな竜姫ですが。

altTitles.en: Bride on the Guillotine: The Dragon Princess Who Destroys the World

description.en:
A "dragon" appears from a container that fell in front of Dazai Ryunosuke's eyes.

The disastrously beautiful "dragon", Rinne Irako, had been condemned to death as a world-destroying calamity, and was being transported to a place of refuge.

Rinne Irako was sentenced to death and transported. But as fate would have it, the "dragon" girl had a miraculous encounter with a boy, and her destiny was about to change drastically.

title.en: Dame Skill [Auto Mode] ga Kakuseishimashita ~Are, Guild no Scout-san, Ore wo "Iranai"-tte Itte Masendeshita?~

altTitles.ja: ダメスキル【自動機能】が覚醒しました～あれ、ギルドのスカウトの皆さん、俺を「いらない」って言ってませんでした？～

altTitles.en: The Useless Skill [Auto Mode] Has Been Awakened: Huh, Guild's Scout, Didn't You Say I Wasn't Needed Anymore?

altTitles.ja-ro: Dame Skill [Jidou Kinou] ga Kakuseishimashita ~Are, Guild no Scout-san, Ore wo "Iranai"-tte Itte Masendeshita?~

description.en:
Young boy Claus was gifted with a Skill called [Auto Mode]. It is an extremely rare skill and he was so pleased when first received it...

Turns out, the skill's abilities [Auto Return] for "only to go home" and [Auto Travel] for "only to go to places that have been visited" are a completely useless ability for both combat and making money!

However, the now leveled up Claus has come to know the true nature of [Auto Mode]!

---

(JP) [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2757gs/) [Light Novel](https://kc.kodansha.co.jp/title?code=1000040012)
description.ja: １５歳の少年クラウスが教会で授かったのは発現自体が珍しいというユニークスキル！　将来は勇者か英雄かと胸を高鳴らせた少年だがその夢は無残にも打ち砕かれる…。スキル【自動機能】は[自動で家に帰れるだけ]のてんで役立たずな外れスキルだったからだ！　スキルレベルが上がればと期待を抱くが、レベル2は[自動で行ったことのある場所へ移動するだけ]、レベル３は[自動で資源を採取するだけ]とがっかりする。ところが念のためクラウスが試してみると…！？

title.en: The Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle

altTitles.en: Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle

description.en:
On the night the kingdom fell and the entire royal family was being executed, Clarisse, who naturally thought she would also die, heard something unexpected. 

“We cannot execute anyone who has not reached the age of eighteen. Instead, I will kill you the day you turn eighteen.” 

And so, Clarisse is given ten years to live. 
Clarisse then heads North as a “prisoner.” 
And she asks the Grand Duke for only one thing… 

“Um, is it okay if I take this friend with me? It’s my only friend.” 

But what Clarisse holds out is a rock? 

It’s a new life in the North! 
But this life as a “prisoner” keeps on getting better…?
description.tr:
Krallığın düştüğü gece ve bütün kraliyet ailesinin idam edildiği sırada, doğal olarak öleceğini düşünen Clarisse, beklenmedik bir şey duydu.
“18 yaşına ulaşmamış olan kimseyi idam edemeyiz. Bunun yerine, 18 yaşına bastığın gün seni öldüreceğim.”
Ve böylece, Clarisse’e yaşaması için on yıl süre verilir.
Clarisse sonra bir “esir” olarak Kuzey’e doğru yol alır.
Ve Büyük Dük’ten sadece bir şey ister…
“Uhm, bu arkadaşımı yanımda götürebilir miyim? O benim tek dostum.”
Ancak Clarisse’nin uzattığı şey bir taş mı? Kuzey’de yeni bir hayat!
Ancak bu “esir” hayatı daha da iyiye gidiyor gibi mi?

altTitles.ja: のみ×しば

description.en: I fell in love very easily. Even though I myself didn’t think that I’m that kind of person. We became roommates unexpectedly in our second year. Having Shiba-chan as my roommate means I’m super lucky, right?

altTitles.en: My First Month in a JEE Coaching

description.en:
Every weekend there will be a new short story containing the mundane incidents in the lives of our Visual Novel's cast. 

We hope you enjoy this slice of JEE-Life webcomic!

Announcement: [Website](https://gartage.itch.io/my-first-month-in-a-jee-coaching/devlog/676516/the-webcomic-is-here), [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/p/C27TQF5vxwR/)

[Beacons](https://beacons.ai/jeediaries)

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 1 - Phantom Blood

altTitles.ro: Aventurile Bizare ale lui JoJo Partea 1: Sângele Trecutului

altTitles.it: JoJo e a sua Aventura Bizarra: Phantom Blood

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Phantom Blood

altTitles.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 1: Jonathan Joestar: His Youth

altTitles.th: Jojoล่าข้ามศตวรรษ

altTitles.es: La Extraña Aventura de JoJo: Sangre Fantasmal

altTitles.fr: Le bizzarre avventure di Jojo: Phantom Blood

altTitles.ar: مغامرة جوجو الغريبة الجزء 1: دماء الشبح

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険
ファントムブラッド

altTitles.pt-br: Jojo's Bizarre Adventure - Parte 1: Phantom Blood

description.en:
First story arc of the Jojo's Bizarre Adventure series.  
  
Jonathan Joestar, a young wealthy son living in Victorian England, has his life destroyed by a recently orphaned Dio Brando, who was taken in by Jonathan's father. Dio, who plots to drive Jonathan to insanity and inherit the Joestar fortune, becomes an unstoppable vampire that Jonathan must fight.

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/read/manga/jojo-s-bizarre-adventure-part-1-phantom-blood/all)

altTitles.th: หอป่วน ก๊วนตัวแสบ

altTitles.ja: ひだまりスケッチ

description.en: Accepted to a high school specializing in the arts, Yuno moves into a nearby apartment complex to make her commute easier. Just a few days into her new routine, she quickly discovers that creativity doesn't end with the art school bell! Her neighbors – Sae, Hiro, and Miya – are all fellow students, and each has her own hilarious quirks. And eccentricity clearly rules this school; Yuno's homeroom teach is a cosplay otaku and the principal is just weird. Will the quiet Yuno be able to handle this creatively kooky cast of characters?

altTitles.ja: カグラバチ

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge. Epic sword battle action!
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.ja: 着たい服がある

altTitles.en: I show my true colors shining through.
There Are Clothes I Want to Wear

description.en:
University student Mami is seen by everyone as the fashionable cool model-type but she secretly just wants to wear Lolita fashion.  
  
While she tries occasionally to be more cute & less "stylish", she can't overcome the image others have of her. When she watches a new coworker at the cafe she works part-time at leave in a extremely flashy outfit, it sparks the courage in her to express herself more truthfully too!

altTitles.ja: 高飛車ドレイちゃん

description.en: At the market, a man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...
description.pt-br: No mercado, um homem se depara com uma escrava particularmente arrogante...

altTitles.ja: メジャーセカンド

description.en: A sequel to the successful baseball manga MAJOR by the same author. The series follows Gorou's son Daigo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Tome wa Hane! Suzusato Koukou Shodoubu

altTitles.ja: とめはねっ!
とめはねっ! 鈴里高校書道部
とめはねっ！−鈴里高校書道部−

description.en:
Tales of a high-school calligraphy club.  
  
A story about a high-school calligraphy club on the verge of breaking up that enters in a major competition while overcoming problems. Yuki, a promising female judoist, and Yukari, a quiet Canadian-raised boy who just returned to Japan, end up joining the club for the sake of maintaining the membership required to keep the club. Together with the old club members with unique characters, they gradually discover the fun of calligraphy and work together to win in the competition.  
  
Tomehane! was nominated for best manga at the first two Manga Taisho.

Live action series adaptation (2010): [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/742-tomehane)

altTitles.ja: ピエロマン

description.en:
Manga artist Toratoki Yamamura's serialized work "Revenge Clown'' has been decided to be made into a movie, and with the support of his beloved wife, he is having the best night in both his professional and private life. However, that was just the beginning of the nightmare that was about to begin...
What is the unexperienced murderous intent called by unconscious malice? ? What is the true identity of the mysterious revenge demon "Clown Man"? ?
Suspense-horror master Shingo Honda collaborates for the first time with Shinsuke Takahashi, a master of writing, to unleash an astonishing and earth-shattering ``wet-clothed'' suspense story! !

title.en: Saikyou Rakudai Kizoku no Kenma Kiwameshi Antou Tan

altTitles.en: The Strongest Failed Aristocrat’s Dark Demon Sword

altTitles.ja: 最強落第貴族の剣魔極めし暗闘譚

altTitles.ja-ro: SAIKYOU RAKUDAI KIZOKU NO KENMA KIWAMESHI ANTANFU

description.en:
The sword saint and the sage are in fact the underdogs of the school! A "one-man, three-role" substandard (dark) fantasy!

Roy Revel is a frontier aristocrat from a lethargic small country. He is known as the "fallen aristocrat" at the school, but he has a secret. 

[The patron god of the land of swords, Cloud the White Sword Saint. 
The patron god of the land of magic, the great sage Eclipse the Black.]

The strongest and most admired of the two great powers is in fact Roy, who plays the role of an incompetent! In order to protect his family, Roy, the strongest nobleman who manipulates the fight against the Empire from the shadows, is interested in the beautiful girls at the academy who aspire to become sword saints and sages.

A new dark fantasy of the fallen aristocrat begins!

altTitles.ja: ドクターストーン

description.en:
Imagine waking to a world where every last human has been mysteriously turned to stone…  

One fateful day, all of humanity was petrified by a blinding flash of light. After several millennia, high schooler Taiju awakens and finds himself lost in a world of statues. However, he's not alone! His science-loving friend Senku's been up and running for a few months and he's got a grand plan in mind—to kickstart civilization with the power of science!
description.it: Anno 5738: da migliaia di anni l'intera umanità si ritrova tramutata in pietra a causa di una catastrofe naturale. Ooki Taiju riesce inspiegabilmente a risvegliarsi, trovandosi così di fronte ad una realtà completamente diversa da quanto ricordava, dove la natura ha ripreso il sopravvento sulla civiltà umana. Al suo risveglio il ragazzo si ricongiunge con il suo amico Senkuu, un giovane e geniale scienziato anche lui risvegliatosi qualche mese prima. Insieme i ragazzi sperano di scoprire la causa dietro all'improvvisa tramutazione in pietra - e, nel frattempo, di trovare una cura. Non tutto, però, va come previsto...
description.pt: Imagina acordar em um mundo onde cada humano foi misteriosamente transformado em pedra… Em um dia fatídico, toda a humanidade foi petrificada em um piscar de olhos. Depois de muitos milênios, o aluno do ensino médio, Taiju, acorda e se encontra perdido em um mundo de estátuas. Entretanto, ele não está sozinho! Seu amigo que ama ciência, Senku, está acordado e correndo pelos últimos meses e ele tem um grande plano em mente, recomeçar a civilização com o poder da ciência!
description.ru: Однажды, когда Тайджу пытался собраться с духом, чтобы признаться девушке в любви, небо заполнил странный свет. Все люди, на которых он падал, превращались в камень. После без малого четырёх тысяч лет он наконец выбирается из каменного плена и начинает исследовать окрестности. Неожиданно Тайджу встречается его старый друг Сенку, очнувшийся полгода назад. Сенку приводит Тайджу в свой примитивный дом на дереве и просит помощи в возрождении исчезнувшей человеческой цивилизации, начиная с попыток выяснить истинную природу света, который превратил людей в камень.
description.pt-br: Um dia fatídico, toda a humanidade foi petrificada por um flash ofuscante de luz. Depois de vários milênios, o colegial Taiju desperta e se vê perdido em um mundo de estátuas. No entanto, ele não está sozinho! Seu amigo de ciência Senku está em funcionamento há alguns meses e ele tem um grande plano em mente: dar o pontapé inicial na civilização com o poder da ciência!

altTitles.ja: 千年ダーリン

description.en:
"A mishmash of steel and metal and an explosion of flesh! Let's celebrate the birth of Millennium Darling!"

1980s: The Town of Senni Dani. After a mysterious and violent incident, Ippei Tsukanoma awakens in the laboratory of Giniro Karisome. Ippei is informed he has been transformed into Millennium Darling, a cyborg created with an ancient lost technology. Ippei, Giniro, and their friends come to discover there are other cyborgs out there... but they are nowhere near as friendly! Now, Ippei and Giniro must face agaisnt these dangerous hostile enemies led by Lord Neiron to protect themselves and Sennen Dani. Welcome, Millennium Darling!

altTitles.ja: エデンズ ゼロ

description.en:
Shiki is a human who lives in a city filled with only robots. He considers the robots to be his best friends, and always takes care of them. Then, one day, he comes across another human - Rebecca, a girl who makes videos online to become popular. And at the same time, the robots start to go crazy?   
   
A new manga from Hiro Mashima, of [*Rave Master*](<https://mangadex.org/manga/1036>) and [*Fairy Tail*](<https://mangadex.org/manga/558>) fame.
description.ru: Она явит читателям абсолютно новую форму фэнтези. Там будет куча довольно-таки вызывающих шуток. Никакой связи с Хвостом новинка иметь не будет. В ней появится Плу из манги Rave Master.
description.tr:
İnsanların terk ettiği bir tema parkı olan Granbell Krallığı'nda artık robotlar yaşamaktadır. Robotların yanı sıra onlarla birlikte yaşamını sürdüren tek bir insan vardır: Shiki. Ömrünü sürekli bu makinelerle beraber yaşasa da günün birinde Rebecca ve kedisi Happy, bu tema parkına gelirler. Yeni ziyaretçilerin bilmediği ise Granbell'in yüzyıllar içerisindeki ilk konukları olduklarıydı. Shiki yeni arkadaşlar edinme yolunda tökezlerken robotlar bir ayaklanma başlatırlar. Doğup büyüdüğü yer artık çok tehlikeli bir hâle gelince Shiki, Rebecca ve Happy'nin uzay gemisine katılır ve uçsuz buçaksız bir uzay macerası başlar.

 [**Rave Master**](https://mangadex.org/title/5923081c-ad82-4a8b-a509-89ebe752db01) ve [**Fairy Tail**](https://mangadex.org/title/227e3f72-863f-46f9-bafe-c43104ca29ee) ile tanınan Hiro Mashima'nın yeni serisi.

altTitles.ja: 怪物公爵の娘

altTitles.vi: Con gái của Công tước Quái Vật

altTitles.NULL: កូនស្រីណព្វរបស់ រលាកដង្ខៅ

description.en:
When her mom goes missing, three-year-old Lotilucia stumbles on a magic crest that transports her to the estate of House Frodium, one of the empire’s most powerful noble families. Little Lottie immediately recognizes Duke Damian Frodium as her dad; he is the so-called “Monster Duke” of demon descent. Once taken into the house, Lottie does her best to stay out of his way. But then she stumbles on a magic book that shows her a story about Duke Frodium’s adopted daughter replacing his dead daughter named Lotilucia! Lottie is shocked but also emboldened by the prophetic tale. If she is meant to die anyway, she might as well be her cheeky self and do as she pleases! This new Lottie wins over her demon dad along with his staff, but will she manage to stay alive and thrive as the Monster Duke’s daughter?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6392044), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=765158)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [TappyToon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/monster-dukes-daughter), [Webtoon](https://www.webtoons.com/en/fantasy/monster-dukes-daughter/list?title_no=4469)

description.id:
Lottie tiba-tiba muncul di kediaman Duke Demian dan ternyata Duke itu adalah ayah kandungnya, tapi Duke ini sering disebut sebagai Duke Monster! Apakah dia benar-benar monster? Dan kenapa ada novel yang mengatakan kalau Lottie tidak bisa hidup lama?

---

description.ja:
魔法で突然公爵家に飛ばされ、そこで暮らすことになったロティ―。 父であるプロデウム公爵は完璧すぎるゆえ、怪物公爵と呼ばれていた。 そんなある日、公爵の書斎で怪しい本を見つけるが・・！？

description.ko:
세상과 단절되어 살아가던 나는 '괴물공작' 이라 불리는 아빠에게 거둬졌다.
어느 날, 아빠의 서재에서 이상한 책을 발견하는데…
이거 내용이 왜 이래? 내가 병 때문에 죽는다고? 그러면서 양녀를 들이고 잘해줘?
어차피 죽을 거라면 그전에는 뭘 해도 안 죽는다는 거잖아! 그렇다면, 정말 로티 맘대로 해버릴 거야!

---

description.ru:
Я была совсем отрезана от мира, пока меня не забрал к себе отец — герцог-монстр. Однажды я незаметно проскользнула в кабинет отца и нашла там странную книгу...
— Что?! Я умру от болезни?! Тогда какого чёрта вы обращаетесь с приёмной дочерью лучше, чем со мной? Раз уж я умру от болезни... Я буду делать всё, что захочу!

---

description.zh:
软萌幼崽有谁能不爱？！
冷酷公爵也成宠女狂魔！
可爱的洛蒂突然有了一个被称为怪物公爵，且看上去不太喜欢自己的爸爸。某一天她在爸爸的书房里发现了一本奇怪的书，里面说她只能活到11岁？而在她死后爸爸竟然收养了一个养女还对她特别好？反正横竖都是死，那我就想做什么就做什么了！

---

title.en: If You're Gonna Dress Up, Do It Like This

altTitles.ja: Do it this way if you wear the clothes.

altTitles.vi: Đã ăn diện thì phải ăn diện sao cho đúng.

altTitles.ja-ro: Fuku wo Kiru nara Konna Fuu ni

altTitles.ja: 服を着るならこんなふうに

description.en: Yuusuke, an average office worker meets with his friend at a reunion, only to find out that the fashion world has left him behind. Now, with the help of his sister Tamaki, Yuusuke must take his step into the world of trends and charisma.
description.pt-br: Yuusuke, um trabalhador de escritório comum encontra-se com seu amigo em uma reunião, apenas para descobrir que o mundo da moda o deixou para trás. Agora, com a ajuda de sua irmã Tamaki, Yuusuke deve entrar no mundo das tendências e do carisma

altTitles.ja: フェイト/エクストラビジュアルファンブック

description.en: Fate/EXTRA Visual Fanbook (フェイト/エクストラ ビジュアルファンブック) is a Fate/EXTRA material book released on February 25, 2011.

altTitles.ja: あしたのあした

description.en:
Chisayo, a high school girl, has a weakness for her best friend's face: 
While being pushed around by her good-natured best friend, she enjoys today and tomorrow to the fullest!
A youthful, everyday comedy!
description.ja:
鈴ヶ森ちか先生初連載！
女子高生・千沙代は、親友の顔が弱点……!?
お調子者の親友に振り回されながら、今日を、明日を楽しみ尽くす！
青春日常系コメディ♪

title.en: Fushigi na Neko no Machi Meltier

altTitles.ja: ふしぎな猫のまち メルティア

description.en:
This is "Meltier," a town of cats. Moko, who has no memory of her past, ends up helping out at a coffee shop in town. There, she meets many unique and fun kittens and friends! A little bit mysterious and extraordinarily happy. A heartwarming fairy tale fantasy of everyday life!

---
Note: Has an original song sung by the author herself called はじめまして、世界！

title.en: Otagai Dondon Hamatteiku Kyouikugakari to Shinnyuushain

altTitles.ja: お互いどんどんハマっていく教育係と新入社員

altTitles.ja-ro: Otagai Dondon Hamatteiku Kyouikugakari to Shinnyuushain

altTitles.en: The Mentor and the New Employee Who are Getting More and More Into Each Other

description.en:
Because of her father's debt, 'Lily' lives in the mansion of her father's creditor, 'Rose'. At the mansion where Lily goes with Anna, the only maid she relies on and loves, she meets the attractive Rose...


[NTR Warning]

altTitles.zh-ro: Xing Meng Ou Xiang Ji Hua

description.en: The shining lights, the magnificent stage! Friendships created through singing, making a future through dancing, the girls embark on their journey towards their dreams! One who has lost status due to a scandal is hiding a plot behind her back. A pair of bosom friends, separated by fate. A girl who tries to exonerate her mother sets off on her journey for a talent competition. When the stage turns into an empty battlefield, she uses her voice to chase after her dreams.

altTitles.ja: スケアリー・キャンパス・カレッジ・ユニバーシティ

description.en: An adolescent ghost story that invites college student's "desire". Drinking parties, looking for clubs, romance... Chigarashi Mahina, a freshman who is busy with her flowery college life, is haunted one night by ghosts after entering an abandoned building. Nights after nights, she had nightmares of her getting raped. She then seeks help from a specialist on campus, Makube Kaoru. That was the beginning of a college life filled with desire and fear...
description.ja: 大学生の“欲”が呼び込む青春怪談――。飲み会、サークル探し、恋愛……。“花の大学生活”に忙しい新入生・千嵐まひなは、立ち入った廃墟で、ある夜、幽霊に取り憑かれてしまった。夜ごと「犯される悪夢」に苦しむようになった千嵐は、救いを求めて学内の“専門家”間九部薫を訪れる。それこそが、欲望と恐怖に満ちた大学生活のはじまりだった――…。
description.vi:
Những hồn ma, những câu chuyện kinh dị được hiện thực hóa từ chính "lòng tham", "dục tính" của những sinh viên Đại học tuổi mới lớn.
Chigarashi Mahina, một cô gái trầm tính liều mình lao đầu vào một buổi tiệc thác loạn trá hình của giới sinh viên hòng tìm cho bản thân một tình yêu để bù vào những năm tháng cấp ba không có thanh xuân của mình.
Trong lúc vô ý đi vào một tòa nhà bỏ hoang, cô đã bị vô số hồn ma đáng sợ ám phải. Để rồi kết quả là mỗi lần đi ngủ, cô phải chịu đựng vô vàn những trận cưỡng hiếp tập thể hằng đêm bởi những hồn ma đó. Tuyệt vọng, cô tìm đến sự trợ giúp của Makube Kaoru, một "chuyên gia" bí ẩn trong khuôn viên trường Đại học mà cô đang theo học, hòng tìm kiếm sự cứu rỗi.
Và đó chính là sự khởi đầu cho một đời sinh viên đầy kinh hoàng và chết chóc của cô...

altTitles.ja: ギャル嫁の秘密

description.en: Fuyuki is a beautiful and cool gal! But there's a secret side of her that she only shows in front of her husband...? A cute love comedy with a gal wife!
description.ja:
冬雪（ふゆき）は美人でクールなギャル！でも「旦那」の前だけ見せる秘密の姿があって……？SNS累計37万いいね！の可愛い「ギャル嫁」とのラブコメディ！
 
--- 
 
Fuyuyuki (Fuyuki) wa bijin de kūruna gyaru! Demo "dan'na" no mae dake miseru himitsu no sugata ga atte...? SNS ruikei 37 man ī ne! No kawaii "gyaru yome" to no rabukomedi!
description.pt-br: Fuyuki é uma linda gyaru! Mas tem um lado secreto que ela só mostra para o seu marido? Uma comédia romântica fofa com uma esposa gyaru!

altTitles.ja: ゆるゆり

description.en: Four mischievous girls illegally occupy the former Traditional Tea Ceremony clubroom, in order to create the "Amusement Club." These scamps…who ignore repeated warnings—in direct rebellion with the righteous directives of the Student Council—decide to remain in the room until they finally get off their bums and do something! In this slightly sluggish manga, full of fits and starts, the four girls set off from their homes for a walk together with days full of a little this and that!
description.pt-br: Quatro garotas travessas ocupam ilegalmente a antiga sala do clube da Cerimônia Tradicional do Chá para criar o "Clube de Diversão". Essas atentadas... que ignoram repetidos avisos - em rebelião direta às justas diretrizes do Conselho Estudantil - decidem permanecer na sala até que finalmente se levantem e façam alguma coisa! Neste mangá um pouco lento, como o título sugere, cheio de trancos e barrancos, as quatro meninas saem de suas casas para passear juntas, com dias cheios dum pouco disso e daquilo!

title.en: Party kara Tsuihou Sareta Sono Chiyushi, Jitsu wa Saikyou Nitsuki

altTitles.en: The Healer Who Was Banished From His Party, Is, in Fact, the Strongest

altTitles.ja: パーティーから追放されたその治癒師、実は最強につき

description.en:
A healer gets booted from his party because the leader notices he isn’t really contributing much to the team.

Soon enough, the healer must look for new members to party with. After finding a cute martial artist to work together with, he reveals his secret - while he’s a fairly mediocre healer, he actually fights well in close combat.

Anyway, here’s the story of a support who’s secretly a DPS, and where the entire conflict stems from the fact that he never told his old party he was DPS.
description.pt-br:
Um curandeiro é expulso de sua equipe porque o líder percebe que ele não está contribuindo muito para a equipe.  
O curandeiro deve procurar novos membros para formar uma equipe. Depois de encontrar uma linda artista marcial com quem quer trabalhar, ele revela seu segredo, embora seja um curandeiro medíocre, ele realmente luta bem no combate corpo a corpo.
De qualquer forma, aqui está a história de um suporte que é secretamente um DPS, e onde todo o conflito decorre do fato de que ele nunca disse a sua antiga equipe que era DPS.

altTitles.ja: カウントラブル

description.en: A self-proclaimed angel decides to intervene with a boy's love life, starting with a timer on his arm which will count down every time his heart beats from interacting with his crush, starting from 10. At 0, the boy will confess everything he is thinking at that moment. But it only starts there! The 'angel' has powers based on the number 10, and grant him the ability to stop time, make someone fall in love with him, learn who others like, and more. With comedy, romance, and drama, this is not a typical shounen series and should not be passed up.

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.ja: 黙示録の四騎士

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

altTitles.ja: この音とまれ！

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Oto Tomare! Sounds of Life

description.en: Since the graduation of the senior members of the club, Takezou ends up being the sole member of the "Koto" (traditional Japanese string instrument) club. Now that the new school year has begun, Takezou will have to seek out new members for the club, or the club will be terminated. Out of nowhere, a new member barges into the near-abandoned club room, demanding to join the club. How will Takezou be able to keep his club alive and deal with this rascal of a new member?

title.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.ja: 花唄メモワール

description.en: Ume Sasaki, a senior in high school, is helping out at her great-grandmother's ryokan during this summer vacation. She goes to the ryokan in hopes of getting some hints about her future...? This is the brightest and most dazzling "memory (memoir)" of the girls.
description.ja:
高校最後の夏休み、ひいばあちゃんが営む旅館「花瀧屋」の手伝いにやってきた佐々木梅。
到着したその夜、梅は露天風呂で滑って、湯船に落ちてしまう。
引っ張り上げてくれたのは…〝ねえさま〟と呼んでくる不思議な少女・藤野だった。

いつもと変わらない花瀧屋。
だけど、炭を使った見知らぬ暖房器具があったり、そもそも季節が夏から冬になっていたり。
これって、もしかして…〝タイムスリップ〟？

時代を越え、少女たちの一途な思いが交差する青春冒険譚、第1巻。

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ
Kyou kara Hajimeru Osananajimi

altTitles.zh-hk: 從今天開始的青梅竹馬

altTitles.zh: 从今天开始的青梅竹马

description.en:
“Will you be my childhood friend?”

Kaede always wished for a childhood friend like in the manga she reads. When she moved next door to her classmate, Kouhei, he said he’d do anything to help her out. So, she asked him to be her childhood friend! 

The two of them have fun adventures recreating all of the things that childhood friends should do!
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)
